repos_data.description: There can be more than Notion and Miro. AFFiNE(pronounced [ə‘fain]) is a next-gen knowledge base that brings planning, sorting and creating all together. Privacy first, open-source, customizable and ready to use.
A privacy-first, open-source platform for knowledge management and collaboration. Download link:  http://github.com/logseq/logseq/releases. roadmap: http://trello.com/b/8txSM12G/roadmap

Langchain-Chatchat（原Langchain-ChatGLM）基于 Langchain 与 ChatGLM, Qwen 与 Llama 等语言模型的 RAG 与 Agent 应用 | Langchain-Chatchat (formerly langchain-ChatGLM), local knowledge based LLM (like ChatGLM, Qwen and Llama) RAG and Agent app with langchain
Build your personal knowledge base with Trilium Notes
Console client for Evernote. This is the current alive fork (in 2024)
